entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then clearing. Rain at times mixed with drizzle early this evening. Wind light except north 30 km/h near Bowen Island overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 24 January 2023
